title: Syndra visual bug-Wrong walk animations

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Hi, 
Syndra has wrong walk animations. When she has no boots she should be upright but clearly she is not. Then when you get tier 2 boots, she should moving at an angle not the atlantean syndra walk. I have tried this on all the other skins (Syndra is my favourite champion). I hope you will fix this issue. Thank you.

replies.body:
Hiya Moncho! 

Thanks for the report! We made some small adjustments to Syndra last patch, and it looks like her run didn't make it in properly. :c We're aware of the issue and are working to resolve this!
Just making the size of the files a bit smaller and more manageable. Nothing affecting visuals/gameplay, or anything you'd actually notice, haha.

You're making files smaller and more manageable?

Could this mean that a replay system is coming our way?
Nope, just managing the size of skin files.

>Or anything you'd actually notice.

Oh, the irony, eh?

Semi-related, were there any changes to the size of Syndra's model at any point? It was detected on the PBE some months ago when others were being changed, but it vanished in the next patch. Around the start of this season, however, Syndra's size dropped noticeably compared to pre-season. As there were no notes, I'm not certain if this also bugged somehow, or an extreme degree of perception bias is occurring in my comparative screen shots.
Mmm, doesn't look like she was part of the champion resizing we did in patch 5.23. The update we just did was for file size, not her as a whole, from what I understand.

I noticed on the PBE cycle for 5.23 she effectively got shaved by about 25%, so my original comparison picture is on 5.22 for 5.23. Syndra distinctly felt different after the 6.xx series of patching began, to the tune of the 5-10% as one might expect.

Maybe I'm crazy. I'll assemble the comparisons when I get home and go over them one last time, and put them up here for verification.
Ahhh. okay! She was reduced, but she missed being put in the patch notes. D: (Just talked to a Champion Update bro.)

Oh? My suspicions were correct then. I'll admit to a little disappointment, as her being 'tall' is something I've enjoyed about her character.

Will the details be appended to indicate how much she was changed? It would look to be the 10% bracket.

Why do Syndra's animation bugs get so much more attention than Zed's animation and audio bugs that have been going on for months now?

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/nYc6oAcr-some-minor-zed-audiovisual-bugs-that-have-been-persisting-for-a-few-months

Goddamn you, OP.

It could've easily become a feature!
